about_the_game:
Combining Horror with Knockout Punches, Rise of the Left Overs is a simple and fun beat'em up game. Plays like Punch-Out, feels like The Thing/Shawn of the Dead, and has amazing hand drawn animation!



Controls are simple. Ever play MegaMan? Simple eh? Punch-Out? Simple. Get the picture? We got some combos and other things lined up for the full game, but rest assured it'll all be a user friendly experience.
